page.title: 06Religion
page.content: North Queensferry _ C of S Rev.W.Baird Sunday 10.00am.South Queensferry _C of S Rev.J.Carrie.Sunday _Family Service 10.00 to 10.30am,Christian Education 10.30 to 11.20am morning service 11.30 to 12.30.Minister's Vestry Hour _ Thurs.6.30 to 7.30.Church Office Hours _ Wed.and Fri. 9.15 _ noon.South Queensferry _ Scottish Episcopal (part of the Anglican communion) Cannon Wallace _ Priory Church of St Mary of Mt Carmel.Sunday _ Sung Eucharist and Sermon 9.15am.For week day services see porch notice board.South Queensferry _ St Margaret's Catholic Church Father Callaghan.Mass on Sunday _ 9.30,11.30,6.00pm Mass on Holydays _ 7.00am,9.00am,7.30pm.Devotions _ Sunday 5.00pm.Confessions _ Sat morning after 10.00am Mass,Sat evening 7.00 _ 8.00pm.
